title: Field Remedy: 1607
subject:
HFM, Turbocharger - No power, engine
jerks, black smoke, P0100 stored in ECU

metadata.complaintGroup:
06 - Failure Code Setting by Control
Unit

complaint:
No power, engine jerks, black smoke, P0100
stored in ECU.
cause:
Turbo charger hose loose at turbochareger
side -> engine looses boost.
production:
Improved installation process as of VIN
W0L0EBR973N006484 .

remedyContent.text:
In case of customer complaint check the correct connection of hose between
turbocharger and intercooler. 
The jubilee clip at turbocharger side has to be tightened with 4 Nm.
Note: Replacement of HFM does not solve the problem.
